title: About
text: Hi! I’m a motivated and curious student at Colorado State University studying Ecosystem Science & Sustainability. I’m passionate about solving real-world problems with data and communicating science in creative, accessible ways.

title: Projects
text:
During my last semester of college I took an interesting class called Quantitative Reasoning with R.

[Building a project website](https://github.com/Seanpear/hello-world.git)
-Used dplyr to clean and summarize real COVID-19 datasets
- Wrote reusable R code in a Quarto .qmd file
- Rendered an HTML report using RStudio
- Practiced visual storytelling and data interpretation
- Learned to troubleshoot errors and improve my coding workflow
